title: French Pan-European Antisemite Attends Banned Neo-Nazi Lukov March In Sofia, Fundraises On His Website: ‘Donations Are Deductible’ | MEMRI
text: A French pan-European antisemitic activist traveled to Sofia, Bulgaria to attend the Lukov March, which has been banned by the Bulgarian authorities. In the past, this activist forwarded posts from the pro-Iranian “Axis of Resistance” channel praising Hezbollah’s armed wing. He has lately been raising funds for his organization. The report provides details. YOU MUST BE SUBSCRIBED TO THE MEMRI DOMESTIC TERRORISM THREAT MONITOR (DTTM) TO READ THE FULL REPORT. GOVERNMENT AND MEDIA CAN REQUEST A COPY BY WRITING TO [DTTMSUBS@MEMRI.ORG](mailto:DTTMSUBS@MEMRI.ORG) WITH THE REPORT TITLE IN THE SUBJECT LINE. PLEASE INCLUDE FULL ORGANIZATIONAL DETAILS AND AN OFFICIAL EMAIL ADDRESS IN YOUR REQUEST. NOTE: WE ARE ABLE TO PROVIDE A COPY ONLY TO MEMBERS OF GOVERNMENT, LAW ENFORCEMENT, MEDIA, AND ACADEMIA, AND TO SUBSCRIBERS; IF YOU DO NOT MEET THESE CRITERIA PLEASE DO NOT REQUEST.
